sentence: And, theres an excellent chance the nuttiest bunny of them all, Doug Mastriano, is going to win the primary."
author: Matthew Chapman
title: Former Ted Cruz staffer slams Pennsylvania GOP: Every governor candidate is an 'election conspiracist' down the 'rabbit hole'

sentence: But the GOP's frontrunner for governor in Pennsylvania's crowded May 17 primary field, state Sen. Doug Mastriano, is an entirely different Republican: a man of deep religious and political convictions who, if he wins the nomination and the general election, could be problematic for Americans who do not want elected officials to impose their personal beliefs on the wider public, whether the topic is abortion, vaccines, denying election results, or calling on God's help to seize political power.
title: Another extreme wing of the Republican Party is emerging  and it's not all Trump

sentence: Republicans in Pennsylvania have expressed fears that Trump-backed gubernatorial candidate Doug Mastriano has no shot in this November's general election.
author: Sarah K. Burris
title: Many Republicans think Doug Mastriano is 'a threat to democracy' and secretly 'pray Dems win': Ex-Ted Cruz aide
